install.name: Top Tags
install.author: Shawn Rice
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2009 by Purdue Research Foundation, West Lafayette, IN 47906
install.description: This module shows a a list of the top used tags.

param.name: numtags
param.label: Number of tags
param.description: The number of tags to display.

param.name: message
param.label: Message
param.description: The message to be displayed if no tags are found

param.name: sortby
param.label: Sort by
param.description: The sort order for tags found

param.name: morelnk
param.label: More links
param.description: Display a link to more tags

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
